gameTicTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
gameTicTacToe.instructions:
The goal of tic-tac-toe is to be the first player to get three in a row on a 3-by-3 grid.
1. Play occurs on a 3 by 3 grid of 9 empty squares.
2. Two players alternate marking empty squares, the first player marking Xs and the second player marking Os.
3. If one player places three of the same marks in a row, that player wins.
 4. If the spaces are all filled and there is no winner, the game ends in a draw.

incontinence.details: Detailed instructions and pictures about pelvic floor exercises

expressiveWriting.details: To start, plan to spend at least 5-10 minutes (or longer, if you want) writing about one of the topics below. The basic instructions are for you to write about your deepest thoughts and feelings about the topic without worrying about spelling, grammar, or sentence structure. Just write.
